title: Graphic Designer
about: Create visual content for marketing materials, events, and social media campaigns.
resonsibilities: Design posters, brochures, and other visual content for marketing
Create event branding and promotional materials
Collaborate with the marketing team to develop engaging graphics
Ensure consistency in branding across all platforms
Prepare graphics for print and digital distribution
skills: Proficient in Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign
Strong understanding of color theory and typography
Time management and ability to meet deadlines
Experience in digital and print media
commitment: Complete design tasks within assigned deadlines
Collaborate with other departments to meet project goals
Be responsive to feedback and iterate on designs

title: Content Writer
about: Craft engaging copy for blogs, newsletters, and social media posts.
resonsibilities: Write blog posts and articles that align with our mission
Draft engaging content for social media platforms
Assist in writing newsletters and press releases
Collaborate with the design team on content presentation
Edit and proofread content for clarity and accuracy
skills: Ability to write in a clear and concise manner
commitment: Collaborate with the marketing team on content strategy
Incorporate feedback and revise content as needed

title: Web Developer
about: Develop and maintain the club’s website and other digital platforms.
resonsibilities: Build and maintain the club’s website
Ensure the website is up-to-date and functioning properly
Collaborate with the design team on website layout
skills: Proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Experience with WordPress or other CMS platforms
Attention to detail and problem-solving skills
Ability to work with cross-functional teams
commitment: Implement feature requests from other teams
Stay up-to-date with the latest web development trends
